text: The 1928–29 NHL season was the twelfth season of the National Hockey League. Ten teams played 44 games each. This was the first Stanley Cup playoffs ever that saw two United States based teams compete for the cup. The Boston Bruins won over the New York Rangers two games to none in a best-of-three final. == Regular season == === Final standings === Note: W = Wins, L = Losses, T = Ties, Pts = Points, GF = Goals
